name: Startu2Venture
tag_list: startup, venture-capital, private-equity, web2-0, internet, database, investment, angel, seed-fund
overview:
We enable entrepreneurs and venture capitalist to analyse business opportunities, develop relations and deliver success.

Startup2Venture is online resource for Startups and Private Equity firms. Whether you are a budding entrepreneur ready to start a business for the first time or an Venture Capital firm looking for investment, It has all the news and information that Entrepreneurs andPrivate Equity Firms need to get small businesses starting on the right foot. Entrepreneurs and Private equity firms consistently will access Startup2Ventures as the leading source of information . The extensive and up-to-date databases availabe as service will explore all the myriad information entrepreneurs may required when bringing their killer idea onto the market. Across our many pages you will find need-to-know information on how to raise financing for your business startup, drafting your business plan, where to find office space & serviced offices, dealing with tax, when to buy and sell, marketing, doing business online, wholesaling, insurance, technology, hiring and firing, health and safety and keep you informed of the latest business seminars and networking for small businesses. We also bring you the latest in business startup news, updating the site daily as stories break, as well as profiles of some of the countryâ€™s top business startups. The site also features a very popular forum where businesses, aspiring entrepreneurs, loyal readers and casual visitors share their ideas on how to start a business. Our belief is that when you are starting a business, taking the risk and putting your time and money into something new that will change your life one way or another, you should have someone by your side
